questions.question: What is aerodynamic drag?
options: Air resistance that opposes the vehicle's motion
The force that keeps tires on the road

questions.question: Why is aerodynamics especially important for EVs?
options: Better aerodynamics reduces energy consumption and extends range
It only affects the car's appearance

questions.question: What is the coefficient of drag (Cd)?
options: A number representing how aerodynamic a vehicle's shape is

questions.question: How do spoilers and air dams affect aerodynamics?
options: They only serve a decorative purpose
They manage airflow to reduce drag and improve stability
